Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2010 08:43PM cassou1 wrote: had a hysterectomy at the age of 49-have the brca1 mutated gene. my sister was tested a year ago after having breast cancer again in her other breast at the age of 52 (41Â when she had breast cancer the first time)unfortunately she passed away a year ago at the age of 52 not from the cancer, but from an infection, leaving behind a great husband and 2 daughters(13 & 16). my question to anyone out there having the brca1 gene, just had hysterectomy, not have the bilateral mystecomy? yes,went through menopause, having hot flashes, can't take anything with estrogen, but feel great. no more periods. on tamoxifen. not ready to get my boobs removed. i feel if i have regular check ups. maommo once a year, mri once a year. hopefully i'm doing the right thing.
Posts.Title: Surgical Menopause at 34? jillyG cassou1
